<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #14252 (build: Run functional tests and benchmarks under the undefined behaviour sanitizer (UBSan) by practicalswift)
* #14224 (Add -fsanitize=integer Travis job. Document intentional and unintentional unsigned integer overflows (wraparounds) using annotations. by practicalswift)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

On Travis we're getting some really wild pointers :-)

When running `test_bitcoin`:

```
Running tests: addrman_tests from test/addrman_tests.cpp
Running tests: arith_uint256_tests from test/arith_uint256_tests.cpp

```

See [Travis output](https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/430046285#L3745).

I can't reproduce locally. I'll investigate!
I think this environment variable can be moved to [.travis.yml](/bitcoin/bitcoin/tree/master/.travis.yml)
